summary: No physical access to data centre building

updates.details: There will be no physical access to the building housing the JASMIN and CEDA services hardware on Friday 14th November 2025. No disruption is expected but in the event of physical equipment failure repairs will not be possible on the day.

summary: Advance notice of next regular scheduled maintenance day

updates.details: Advance notice of scheduled maintenance day on Tues 27th January 2026. Please plan your work to minimise disruption.

summary: Jobs not being scheduled on LOTUS

updates.details: Batch jobs are currently not getting scheduled to run on LOTUS. We are investigating the issue.
The issue has been resolved, jobs are now being allocated again on LOTUS.

summary: Technical problem affecting access to disk storage systems.

updates.details: We currently have a technical problem affecting at least the archive disk volumes, possibly other disk systems as well, so ALL disk storage systems are potentially affected. The team is currently investigating as a matter of urgency. So far we believe this is unrelated to Cloudflare issues reported in the media.
